name: Willowhaunt
description: The Willowhaunt resembles a living willow tree due to its magical illusion that cloaks its skeletal remains beneath.
memorable: Unique ability to compel others to kill their allies through manipulation.
goals: To create chaos and confusion among enemies while using illusions to hide its true form.
relations: Might be encountered alongside other undead minions or creatures that thrive in darkness.
environment: Often found in dark forests or graveyards, places associated with death and decay.
strengths: Immunities to necrotic and poison damage, and resistance to non-magical physical attacks.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical attacks due to reliance on illusion for defense.
attacks: Delivers powerful slam attacks with a combination of bludgeoning and necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Provoke Murder, which incites chaotic violence among nearby creatures.
senses: Has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in darkness.
skills: Possesses high proficiency in Intimidation and Insight, effectively instilling fear and gauging emotions.
additional_information: Highly persuasive due to exceptional Charisma score.
Can dismiss its illusion as a bonus action.
Affected by short-term or long-term madness through specific attacks.
Targets affected by its Provoke Murder cannot distinguish allies from foes.
Relies on tactical abilities to turn battles in its favor despite slow movement.
test_queries: undead creature that looks like a willow tree
monster that instigates chaos among allies
huge evil undead with illusion abilities
manipulative monster causing madness in foes
creature with necrotic immunity and illusions
